note: Emma's birthday party planning is underway. Need to book the venue by next week. Sarah suggested the adventure park, which sounds perfect for a 7-year-old.

note: Dinner with Mike tonight was exactly what I needed. He's going through similar challenges with the new React framework at his company. We decided to start a bi-weekly coding session to help each other.

note: Lisa surprised me with tickets to the tech conference in March! Best wife ever. Need to request time off work and arrange for her parents to watch the kids.

note: Team sprint planning went well today. Manager Tom assigned me to lead the new authentication feature. Feeling both nervous and excited about the responsibility.

note: Tech conference was amazing! Met several people from the industry including Sarah from DevOps Monthly. She's interested in my containerization approach and wants to feature it in their blog.

note: Spring league soccer for Emma starts this weekend. Coach Brian sent the schedule. Looks like I'll need to adjust my Friday work hours to make the practices.

note: Code review with the team went better than expected. The authentication feature is on track. Dave suggested some performance improvements that make a lot of sense.

note: Anniversary planning for next month is in progress. Thinking of surprising Lisa with a weekend getaway. Karen offered to watch the kids if we need.

note: Lunch with the development team today. We celebrated the successful launch of the authentication feature. Tom hinted at a possible promotion discussion in my next review.

note: 8th anniversary with Lisa today! The B&B surprise was a hit. We spent the day wine tasting and agreed to make this an annual tradition without the kids.

note: Family meeting about the summer road trip. Kids are excited about seeing the Grand Canyon. Lisa has most of the route planned, but I need to handle the tech details and car maintenance.

note: Mid-year review with Tom went extremely well. Got the promotion to Senior Developer! Salary bump starts next month. Need to celebrate with Lisa.

note: Back to work after vacation. New project kickoff with the team today. We're building a payment processing system, and I've been assigned the security component. Exciting challenge.
